title: ‡∂Ö‡∂∏‡∑î‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂≠‡∑ô‡∂ö‡∑î ‡∑É‡∂∏‡∂ú ‡∂Ø‡∑Ö‡∂Ø‡∑è ‡∂∏‡∑è‡∑Ö‡∑í‡∂ú‡∂∫‡∂ß ‡∂ú‡∑í‡∂∫ ‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂±‡∂Ω‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∑í‡∂∏‡∑í‡∂¥‡∑è‡∂±‡∂±‡∑ä
description:
Albert Malcolm Ranjith Patabendige Don, often known simply as Malcolm Ranjith or Albert Malcolm Ranjith, is the cardinal of the Catholic Church, Sri Lanka. He is the ninth and current Archbishop of Colombo, serving since 2009. He was elevated to the cardinalate in 2010

Questions were posed at His Eminence Malcolm Cardinal Ranjith, the Colombo Archbishop on a recent statement he made aimed at Presidential Candidates on the April attacks.

His Eminence affirmed his previous statement on extending his support to a candidate who would set up an independent commission to probe the April attacks.

Journalists referred to a similar promise made by Gotabaya Rajapaksa asking whether the SLPP candidate would receive the support of the Cardinal. He responded that his statement was not made favouring any specific party and it is up to the people to decide who they should vote. ‚ÄúWe will never tell the people to vote for a certain party‚Äù, he continued.

His Eminence further mentioned in reference to the promise made by Gotabhaya Rajapaksa, that he does not have the political power to keep his promise adding that they are awaiting the response from those currently in power.

Journalists raised a question on his beliefs regarding the propriety of investigations on the killings of Roshen Chanaka and Anthony.

The Cardinal replied that even though it was mentioned that the report of the Presidential Commission was released it was not made public. He further mentioned that he was told nothing could be done until the Attorney General provides a response on the matter.

Journalists further specified the question references to Rathupaswala to which he replied that the investigations on the recent killings and the investigations on the killings during the JVP era including the killing of its own leader cannot be trusted. He added that the commission has to be able to enforce the law irrelevant of the person.
His Eminence Malcolm Cardinal Ranjith, the Colombo Archbishop accompanied President of the Italian Episcopal Conference Italy Gualtiero Cardinal Bassetti to visit the Temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic in Kandy.

‚ÄúThe crime was committed by those who are against humanity‚Äù, he continued commenting on 04/21 attacks.

comments.comment: Apita deshapalabaya wdak naha me wipatha sidu une ape ratata.nathi une ape sahodarayo demawpiyo daruwo me hamoma srilankika purawasiyo.ehenam me hamotama wada aithiyak uthukamak thiyenne katada rate janadhi pathita saha agamathi ta.aduma tharame me asaranayanta mehema karapu muslim anthawadayanta dhaduwam dunnada? Owunta oni janathawage X witharai.ape inna moda ralata meka therenbe nathi eka thama lokuma karume.budist da katholikada kiyana eka newei prashne me okkoma sinhala ekama lakmawage daruwo.desapaluwo okkoma kudammage salakili dakkuwe.hamuduruwo witharai cadinal thuma ekka mahameru parwathaya wage hitiye.duka beda gaththe unwahansela.dan chande laga nisa okkoma janathawata hari karunawai.rawayenna epa oya degolloma rizardla zalila laga thiya genainna aya.ko thawama 21 weda une mokada kiyala hewwada fan unta ewa mathakath naha mat duka mechchara deyak karalath janathawa un passe yana eka marichcha minissunta sadaranaya itu wenna nam owun degolloma parajaya karanna oni.katholika kisima kenek me para U.N.P. Ekatanam chande denne naha.waradila hary kawruhary dunmogh 21 wenida fathana wala owunuth waga kiyanna oni.mokada dana danamai palli walata oka kale.
comments.author: Judy Kulathunga

replies.replyComment: E thathwayata waga kiyanna one unp yata wada ara nugath janadipathi haraka. Uge thiyena moda uddatchcha kama nisa thamai me okkoma une. Raniluth waga kiyanna one mokada uge eeta eha giya uddachcha kama nisa arakshaka mandalayata hiye naha. Ohe ona ekak wenna kiyala balagena hitiya. Mahindath waga kiyanna one ochchara danagenath kiuwe naha mokada eken deshapalana wasi janadipathiwaranayata laba ganna puluwan nisa. Aduma gane ochchara hoda yaluwa wuna cardinalta hari kiyanna thibba. Mun okkoma ekai. Mun okkoma gana Deviyan balagaththawe. Deviyo nihada wunath soba dahama nisi padam uganwawi. Sama kriyawakatama prathi kriyawak athi sathya hamotama widinna wewi. Munta pamanak nowa munta kade yana wahal harak ralatath waga kiyanna wewi.

replies.replyComment:
@Sri Lanka 
You have not answered my questions which are very simple.
I could ignore replying your message,but through shear sympathy I am sending this note.
I agree that it was the disciples of Jesus who killed him. But in the present case it was the Muslim extremist group that killed hundreds of followers of Jesus. Cardinal did not kill any for him to be deprived of the Heavens.
Please take my advice. You are a mentally deranged man or have an idiosyncratic mind set
. It could very well be that you have a religiously eccentric mind set. 
You have 2 alternatives to live as a normal sensible human being.
Become a Pastor or Go to a phcychiatrist and explain that you are intoxicated by the chronicles in the Holy Bible and your thoughts are only with the contents there and cannot see or think anything beyond it. 
In short you have a negative intelligence ( IQ). Ask the doctor as to what should be done.
Possibilities are not many 
1 To enter a Christian Seminary
. 2 To meet an intelligent and pragmatic Christian Bishop and state your  case of  having an extreme religious but eccentric mind set and ask him what to do? 
The other alternative is to enter Angoda Mental Hospital.
Please do not misunderstand me.
It is a universally accepted fact that those people (or patients) having an unsound mind ( madness) do not know that they are patients. some one has to advice.
I have made these suggestions with utmost sincerity but I do not wish to enter into a dialogue as you have av oided my two questiones in the earlier mail and instead you  have gone back to the Holy Bible which clearly indicates religious lunacy or eccentricity.
Take my advice Good Luck and may God Bless you to lead a life of happiness with infused intelligence leaving behind the ugly ignorance with which you are soaked with as of now!

@Thilak Ranaweera 
You people follow cardinal instead of Jesus....
Don't forget Jesus was killed by high priests ...they pushed to kill Jesus...
Just follow Jesus not cardinal because according to the bible cardinals will never go to heaven...
Unfortunately you're blind to the truth like high priests who accused  Jesus....
In the last days these things happen....as it is written..
Don't be misled by people...
If you want get everlasting life ...
Get to Jesus and his father .
Cardinals can't save you in the great tribulation....
Read this , repent and pray..(John 17.3)
Thank you for the reply

@Sri Lanka You are taking a quote by Jesus totally out of context.
You should study the Bible  in more detail before your ignorance is displayed.
Under Temptation of Jesus, 4.8 Luke, he answered the devil "" It is written 'Worship the Lord your God and serve him only "
The devil led him to Jerusalem and had him stand on the highest point of the temple" etc
So where does your claim that people are crucifying Jesus every day ! stand?
There  is a saying that little knowledge is dangerous and you just fit into it
Now coming back to your indirect criticism about Most Reverend Cardinal Cooray, please tell me what you would have done had you being the Cardinal,Head of the Catholic Church, when hundreds of Christian worshippers  were killed by  suicide bombers?
 Repeatedly say a prayer  "Worship the Lord" Is that what you are suggesting?
Question No 2: If you had being a surviving victim without eyes or legs or arms what is your reaction?
  Repeat the prayer "Worship the Lord your God and serve him only'
Is that your suggestion ?
My advice to you is not to live in a  mental cocoon formed thousands of years back but certainly quote the Bible where appropriate and fitting.
My sympathies for your distorted mind set and do not criticise that Great Cardinal.

@Thilak Ranaweera 
You also follow humans instead of Jesus.
You're the ones who crucified Jesus...
Jesus said   worship your God and serve him only..(luke 4.8)
But these religious leaders do not practice that obviously....
You people kill Jesus everyday.....
You people follow only people but not Jesus..

We assess people based on their human qualities and the Cardinal tops the list.
What and how to interpret what Jesus has said should still be 
 within human values and accepted norms of decency .
Your comment about Cardinal is totally inappropriate and reflect only your lunacy or idiocy
Yes this cardinal follows rajapakse
Are you a Sri Lankan?
